author: James Joyce
text: Thanks for Prezioso’s certificate and await others. I signed today contract with Maunsel. Send Grant Richards’ letter in which he writes of projected style and binding. I called to three papers here. None would take interview with Caruso. Abbey Theatre here produces Shaw’s censored play: Shewing up of B– P– on Wed. Have been to manager who reserves stalls for me. Would P.d.S. accept article. Don’t know how to translate Shewing Up. Do you? Send bundle of Italian papers to crib from and reply express. Trying to work press pass to Galway. Raise all you can. Eva comes with me. Try G.P.O. for that 18 crs. Send Rascovich’s certificate as I am sending in application. Roberts wishes dark grey binding with dark red lettering. Very anxious at silence Jim
